metadata.title: CVE-2018-19115 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
keepalived before 2.0.7 has a heap-based buffer overflow when parsing HTTPstatus codes resulting in DoS or possibly unspecified other impact, becauseextract_status_code in lib/html.c has no validation of the status code andinstead writes an unlimited amount of data to the heap.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19115` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

keepalived - 1:1.3.9-1ubuntu0.18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: keepalived package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.3.9-1ubuntu0.18.04.2').
